title: MailRisk by Secure Practice
descriptionMarkdown: Data connector to push emails from MailRisk into Microsoft Sentinel Log Analytics.

sampleQueries.query:
MailRiskEmails_CL
| where spf_s == 'pass' 
| sort by TimeGenerated desc

MailRiskEmails_CL
| where Category == 'scam' 
| sort by TimeGenerated desc

sampleQueries.description: Emails with link urls that contain the string "microsoft"
sampleQueries.query:
MailRiskEmails_CL
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
| mv-expand link = parse_json(links_s)
| where link.url contains "microsoft"

dataTypes.name: MailRiskEmails_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
MailRiskEmails_CL
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

value:
MailRiskEmails_CL
            | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)

customs.description: Read and write permissions to Azure Functions to create a Function App is required. [See the documentation to learn more about Azure Functions](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-functions/).

customs.name: API credentials
customs.description: Your Secure Practice API key pair is also needed, which are created in the [settings in the admin portal](https://manage.securepractice.co/settings/security). If you have lost your API secret, you can generate a new key pair (WARNING: Any other integrations using the old key pair will stop working).

instructionSteps.description: >**NOTE:** This connector uses Azure Functions to connect to the Secure Practice API to push logs into Microsoft Sentinel. This might result in additional data ingestion costs. Check the [Azure Functions pricing page](https://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/details/functions/) for details.
Please have these the Workspace ID and Workspace Primary Key (can be copied from the following), readily available.

instructionSteps.title: Azure Resource Manager (ARM) Template
instructionSteps.description:
Use this method for automated deployment of the MailRisk data connector using an ARM Template.

1. Click the **Deploy to Azure** button below. 

	[![Deploy To Azure](https://aka.ms/deploytoazurebutton)](https://aka.ms/sentinel-mailrisk-azuredeploy)
2. Select the preferred **Subscription**, **Resource Group** and **Location**. 
3. Enter the **Workspace ID**, **Workspace Key**, **Secure Practice API Key**, **Secure Practice API Secret** 
4. Mark the checkbox labeled **I agree to the terms and conditions stated above**.
5. Click **Purchase** to deploy.

instructionSteps.title: Manual deployment
instructionSteps.description: In the open source repository on [GitHub](https://github.com/securepractice/mailrisk-sentinel-connector) you can find instructions for how to manually deploy the data connector.
